18. 

```{r}
krats <- surveys %>% 
  filter(species_id == "DM" | species_id == "DO" | species_id == "DS") %>% 
  select(year, plot_id, species_id, hindfoot_length)
krats %>% 
  group_by(species_id) %>% 
  summarise(mean_hf = mean(hindfoot_length, na.rm = TRUE))
```
